question: Who is offering a purse of Novigrad crowns for slaying a beast in the Oxenfurt Forest and what conditions does he specify?
answer: Hans of Cidaris, a soldier of fortune and veteran of many wars, offers a purse of Novigrad crowns to anyone who kills the monster terrorizing the local peasantry near Oxenfurt. He specifies that any man without a trophy will not receive gold but will be harshly dismissed.
